info.headline: Hard Freeze Warning issued January 22 at 3:04AM CST until January 22 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 24. * WHERE...Northern Newton, Southern Jasper, Southern Newton, Tyler, Hardin, Northern Jasper and Orange Counties. * WHEN...Until 9 AM CST this morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
